feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 12:47 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over higher terrain. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over higher terrain. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
